channel.title: Looking for a Coder. Need help
channel.description:
List of things ull need to do
Help me build a server from someone else source. Credit will be given to The creators of the Source/Client Editing certain things , adding new shops , items to the shops
Setting up a donor place
Points system will be nice to unless the source already has it

item.title: Looking for a Coder. Need help
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

You’re not allowed to request a “coder.” Everything you listed can be found in the Server Tutorials board.

If you have a specific question on something, that’s when you post a question in this section.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a Coder. Need help
